Description:
Time to make the lifestyle change you want
Set on approx 5 acres, this property will provide a lovely lifestyle change. Located just 15 minutes from Geelong and only a few minutes to Drysdale and Portarlington this comfortable home not only boasts convenient location but also offers serene views. Featuring 4 bedrooms, the main with ensuite/WIR, a study/sewing room, a family bathroom services the 3 minor bedrooms, a cosy kitchen and meals area, lounge room with stunning views across your property and beyond and a second sitting room with gas log fire. With power, mains water and bottled gas, all your services are available.
Outside lies endless opportunities with a beautiful vista providing the perfect back drop to outdoor living. A well used tennis court provides an alternate area for children to play basketball, ride bikes and with some TLC could be the practice court for the next world champion! The double carport offers undercover accommodation, plus a small shed. Plenty of established trees provide privacy and shade. Add your touch to the home & garden and make it your dream lifestyle property.
Situated literally next door to the fabulous Curlewis golf course and close to the Drysdale school precinct and only 3kms from the town centre, this is the complete affordable package.

Description:
LAST WIDE FRONTAGE IN THE STREET
15 Appleby Street, Curlewis is located on the Bellarine Peninsula just 17 kms from the Geelong CBD and within close proximity to beaches, fishing, wineries, golf course, boat ramps, shops and short walk to local parks in new area. The block has a huge 16 metre frontage, is 33 metres in length and is 528 sq metres in total. The block is fully serviced, two sides already fenced and is ready to build your dream home. Already under construction is a new Woolworths supemarket due to for completion in 2015. The block has reasonable covenants, no fill, no time restrictions, last availalbe block on Appleby Street with the 16 metre frontage. A genuine sale with quality homes surrounding. Just to add to the above list it also includes NBN for faster internet.

Description:
A HOMELY HOME ON 25 ACRES WITH BAY VIEWS!
This solidly custom built home on 25 Acres comprising 3 Bedrooms and 2 Bathrooms is a beauty. Comprising approx 25 squares of home under roofline plus double garage this very neat, tidy and spacious home welcomes your inspection. Immaculately maintained and well presented you may like to get lost in the garden, relax and take in the views of the bay and You Yangs or just sit in front of the fire with a glass of red. Further features of the property include solar power, ducted heating and cooling, tank and mains water, exposed beam ceilings, hay and farm shedding, electric fencing, a low maintenance property. An inspection will not disappoint.

Description:
VENDOR SAYS "SELL SELL SELL"
This immaculate home is less than 12 months old and is ready for you to move straight in and enjoy the comforts of that brand new feeling. Fully equipped with all the modern fittings this home is perfectly located within a quiet street in the Curlewis Parks Estate and is directly opposite a large park and playground perfect for the kids to run around. The home also features a 2 way gas log fire place which will heat the home beautifully on those cold winter nights. The home also features an optic fibre system through Opticomm which allows for receiving the fastest available internet speeds ranging up to 100 mbps. One of the features of Opticomm compared to the standard NBN system is the ability to connect both free to air and pay TV without the need for TV antennae or satellite dishes. Perfectly located close to schools and the soon to be built Curlewis Shopping Centre with easy access to public transport this home definately will not disappoint.

Description:
SHORT WALK TO KIDS PARADISE!
My vendor's plans have changed but they were drawn to the feature of living over the road from a kid's playground a new estate and a new start, which is soon to have a new shopping complex and only 20 minutes from the city of Geelong is this block of land in Curlewis. Wide frontage wide range of plan options.
I have taken the liberty of making your decision easier by approaching a local builder to make some suggestions of some plans that will suit the land. These plans are attached.
If you want to design your own layout or already have a builder in mind no problem, this land and its location is looking for someone to help complete the landscape of the street. If I was kid I would thoroughly enjoy playing on this playground.
Have a wander on the land take your mind to living in your new home with new surroundings.

Description:
'Ardcree'
Absolute Bay Frontage
Uninterrupted Panoramic Bay Views to Melbourne & You Yangs
World Class Investment & Lifestyle
* 76 Acres (30.75 ha) of quality undulating prestigious Bellarine Peninsula country
* Absolute Corio bay frontage of approx. 650 meters
* Family home with outdoor entertaining areas
* Substantial Shedding and Yards, town water connected
'Ardcree' One of the most outstanding absolute bay frontage properties in the greater Geelong district. Unique land-bank investment in a tightly held & capital appreciating region. 10 minutes Ocean Grove (Surf Beach), 15 minutes Queenscliff (Ferry Service), 15 minutes Geelong, 30 minutes Jetstar Avalon Airport, 60 minutes Melbourne CBD & International Airport

Description:
Best Priced Block On The Street
The owners have decided that building is not for them and would like to secure an established home which has lead to the sale of this magnificent block. 8 Kelpie Boulevard is situated in the new Coriyule Estate which is close to schools, shops & the boat ramp. A new shopping complex in Curlewis is also due to commence in the near future. My vendors have said that the location is what attracted them to the area in the first place with easy access to Geelong & The Surf Coast. Excellent growth has been predicted in the area over the next few years so all you have to do is decide if you would prefer to secure at today's prices.
Call now to enquire

Description:
Brand new high spec coastal home
My first impressions walking through this home are "wow what a modern look", walking through a sense of natural light is evident immediately through the large entry and particularly the north facing living room, cleverly designed with cathedral style ceiling allowing for maximum sunlight throughout the day.
On the rare occasion a builder will design the house around the block not the other way... The feeling this home gives touring can only be expressed in person - an inspection is a must.
Features include:
- 3 bedrooms
- Master with walk in robe & ensuite
- Kitchen with 40mm stone bench & s/s appliances, inc dishwasher
- Reverse cycle heating & cooling
- Large north facing living
- Double garage with internal access
- Plenty of space north facing yard
Curlewis Parks designed for those seeking more than just convenience but a sensational Bayside lifestyle, with access to Geelong an easy drive, however Drysdale offering so much and expanding further there will be less reasons to have to leave.
See link for more details
http://www.curlewisparks.com.au/location/amenities/

Description:
Simply Stunning at every Glimpse
Situated in the highly sought after Bisinella "Bella View Estate", lays this superb near new "Dennis Family Home". Simply stunning from every glimpse this warm contemporary brick home is highly welcoming. Upon entry is the master bedroom, with a beautiful en-suite and walk in robe. Moving along a tiled hall way you are greeted by a private and exclusive living area to the left of the home. A large open plan and spacious kitchen, dining and living meets one at the end of the hall way. This versatile space is perfect for the growing family. A designer quality kitchen equipped with stainless steel appliances, gas top and electric oven is both spacious and charming overlooking the dining area with view of the Curlewis countryside. Nestled away is the bedroom quarters, with three spacious bedrooms includes built in robes and lead to a family style bathroom. In a contemporary finish, featuring semi frame less glass shower and bath, this bathroom is simply stunning.
Upon entry to the yard of the home is an undercover alfresco area, with views of the county side, along with overseeing the dining and kitchen zone. Nestled in the rear corner of the yard features a garden shed and quite hidden oasis, somewhere private and isolated for one to relax in the afternoon sun. With established gardens, little to no work is to be done to the yard. This home includes a three car garage, with internal access to the home and additional access via a single roller door to the rear of the yard.
This home is simply stunning and will not last for long. Make this home yours and inquire today.
